Fix notifications bug.

Fix a bug where multiple notifications were not handling pending intents properly. Case was when multiple notifications appeared, user would tap on a notification and it would open the PostDetailsActivity, but while the PostDetailsActivity was already opened, if user tapped on other post notification, it was not working.

2. Add update post support in content provided.

1. Show notification containing latest post whenever SyncAdapter is synced.
2. Only restrict syncing to posts for the time being.
3. Fix a bug where background sync was not working due to non-required permission check.

title: Update gradle plugin versions to the latest
message: Update gradle plugin versions to the latest

title: fix: Fixed bug related with viewpager and orientation changes.
message:
fix: Fixed bug related with viewpager and orientation changes.

Fixed a bug where application was crashing on PostDetails and UserProfile screens due to NullPointerException. This exception was being thrown because accessing some elements of fragments of a viewpager after orientation changes  would be null, thus the application would crash with NullPointerException. So, from now on the viewpager fragments are accessed via fragment manager instead.

title: feat: Reduced application size.
message:
feat: Reduced application size.

Reduced application size by removing unnecessary dependencies and by replacing some of the png images by their webp counterparts.

title: fix: Fixed post details bug.
message:
fix: Fixed post details bug.

Fixed a bug generating in post details where data was fetched from database way too faster, even before the viewpager with fragments was initialized. Now, even if the data is fetched from db faster, it will not update the viewpager's fragment until the viewpager is initialized properly.

title: fix: Fixed user details bug.
message:
fix: Fixed user details bug.

Fixed a bug generating in user details where application was not being notified in case of service request failure.

title: fix: Fixed categories bug.
message:
fix: Fixed categories bug.

Application will always check for categories on startup, even fetch new categories if categories are not available in current database. This removes the bug where categories were not persisting into the database when user updates the application with updated database version. Also added new screenshots.

title: feat: Added User Profile support.
message:
feat: Added User Profile support.

User profiles can be viewed from now on:
 1. Created new UI for viewing user profile.
 2. User profile screen will show votes, submitted, made, following and followers tabs with respective data.
 3. User profiles will be cached in local database for better UX.
 4. Removed EventBus support from PostDetails and UserProfile.
 5. Multiple bug fixes.

Resolves: #2

title: feat: Added category support.
message:
feat: Added category support.

Added category support in PostDetails screen:
 1. Created a separate table in db for categories.
 2. Categories are fetched from ProductHunt API, if somehow the categories cannot be fetched the system will automatically fallback and load local .json file containing categories.
 3. Category and Votes count will now be displayed alongside post's publish time in PostDetails screen.
 4. Fixed a bug where application was crashing while sharing post from its details screen on pre-nougat devices.

Resolves: #7, #9

title: refactor: Rearranged code and optimized imports.
message: refactor: Rearranged code and optimized imports.

title: docs: Added new screenshots.
message:
docs: Added new screenshots.

Added new screenshots for PostDetails and Settings screen.

title: feat: Modified PostDetails and About screen for better UX.
message:
feat: Modified PostDetails and About screen for better UX.

Integrated these features:
 1. Added TabLayout and ViewPager integration in PostDetails and About screen to split data into meaningful entities, thus improving the UX.
 2. Added a refresh menu item in PostDetails for refreshing the data.
 3. Fixed the jittering bug in PostDetails Screen (screen used to jitter when PostDetails AppBarLayout was expanded initially).

 Resolves: #6

title: fix: Fixed a bug where release build was crashing on opening settings page.
message: fix: Fixed a bug where release build was crashing on opening settings page.

title: feat: Added theme support.
message:
feat: Added theme support.

Added support for 3 new themes:
 1. Added light, dark and amoled themes.
 2. Refactored themable properties into attrs.xml for easy theming.
 3. Fixed a bug where maker's user image was loading in lower quality than expected.

title: fix: Fixed a bug generated due to the recent migration of RxJava and RxAndroid.
message: fix: Fixed a bug generated due to the recent migration of RxJava and RxAndroid.

title: refactor: Updated RxJava and RxAndroid versions.
message:
refactor: Updated RxJava and RxAndroid versions.

Updated RxJava and RxAndroid versions and replaced all of the reactive based code with respect to the new library. Also increased the version of the application.

title: fix: Widget's data sync now works, the data is updated after a little bit of delay though.
message: fix: Widget's data sync now works, the data is updated after a little bit of delay though.

title: feat: Widget's data will be updated as soon as new posts are fetched.
message: feat: Widget's data will be updated as soon as new posts are fetched.

title: refactor: Removed cursor loader until a proper framework isn't created for handling it.
message: refactor: Removed cursor loader until a proper framework isn't created for handling it.

title: feat: Added cursor loader for fetching posts listing.
message: feat: Added cursor loader for fetching posts listing.

title: feat: Updated README.md.
message:
feat: Updated README.md.

Added google play store badge.

title: feat: Updated README.md.
message:
feat: Updated README.md.

Fixed text formatting and added screenshots.

title: feat: Added screenshots.
message: feat: Added screenshots.

title: feat: Updated README.md
message: feat: Updated README.md

title: feat: Minor RTL fixes.
message: feat: Minor RTL fixes.

title: feat: Generated signed config and added release keystore.
message:
feat: Generated signed config and added release keystore.

Signed apk can now be built using installRelease command. Integrated these features:
 1. Added proper application flavors to manage both debug and release build types.
 2. Added release.jks keystore file so that a signed apk can be built directly using installRelease gradle task.
 3. Integrated firebase analytics and firebase crash reporting.
 4. Updated README.md with proper information about the project.

title: feat: Added changelog and and changed comments sorting in PostDetails.
message:
feat: Added changelog and and changed comments sorting in PostDetails.

User can now view application changelog and report feedback via about screen. Integrated these features:
 1. Added ability to view changelog via integrating changelog library.
 2. Added feedback reporting.
 3. Changed comments sorting, such that top level comments will be sorted by their vote counts and their children will be sorted according the time of their creation.
 4. Reduced app icon size that was powering Splash screens and some other screens of the application.
 5. Made the OnboardingSecondView scrollable by changing its core ViewGroup type to ScrollView instead of LinearLayout.
 6. Removed the warm up of chrome custom tabs as they were interfering with the UI thread and creating some lag.
 7. Added special thanks section in About screen.

title: feat: Added posts widget.
message:
feat: Added posts widget.

Created a widget through which users can view the posts directly from their homescreen. Integrated these features:
 1. Created a list type widget to show users posts listing.
 2. PostsWidget is powered by content provider which entire app uses to maintain its data.
 3. PostsWidget state is updated whenever the posts listing is updated via PostsFragment or SyncAdapter updaing posts in background.

title: refactor: Rearranged code and optimized imports.
message: refactor: Rearranged code and optimized imports.

title: feat: View media in full screen and prepared about screen.
message:
feat: View media in full screen and prepared about screen.

Created MediaFullScreenActivity and AboutActivity, as well as performed changes in SettingsActivity with a addition of SyncAdapter. Added these features:

 1. MediaFullScreenActivity will contain all of the media belonging to that post (exluding videos).
 2. Clicking on any media except videos will open MediaFullScreenActivity. In case of videos, an intent handling the video link will be fired.
 3. Created AboutActivity through which users can view details about the application and check various things like libraries the application uses,etc.
 4. Created SyncAdapter which will sync data in background at appropriate intervals.
 5. Updated SettingsActivity and it now provides the user to control the ability to turn sync on/off manually as well as providing the sync interval.
 6. Added runtime permission handling in OnboardActivity.
 7. Modified PostDetailsActivity by shifting the MediaRecyclerAdapter from fragment part to the activity inside the AppBarLayout.
 8. Integrated app icons and placeholder texts.
 9. Commented out User Profile functionality from UI as it is not completed yet.

title: feat: Created Collection listing screen and collection details screen.
message:
feat: Created Collection listing screen and collection details screen.

Created collection details screen where user can view posts inside a particular collection. Added these features:

 1. Integrated collection details web service into the wrapper through which we can fetch details of any collection by providing its id.
 2. Altered post_tables that will also save the posts from .
 3. Proper offline scenario handling as all of the data is stored in the database.
 4. User will be redirected to the post details screen if he/she clicks on any post inside a particular collection.
 5. Added a listener interface in LoadingView that will notify when the animation is complete, might be useful in future scenarios.

title: feat: Created Collection listing screen w/ multiple bug fixes.
message:
feat: Created Collection listing screen w/ multiple bug fixes.

Created collection screen where user can view featured collections. Added these features:

 1. Added appropriate tables that will handle data regarding collection listing screen.
 2. Showing collections in a StaggeredGrid RecyclerView with randomly colored background with pagination.
 3. Replaced the cursor powering posts listing and collections listing screen with normal pojo list objects. This fixed the issue with recycler view which was generating due to some inconsistency. More on that bug here: http://stackoverflow.com/q/30220771
 4. User can now open redirect urls directly (if available) from the post details screen.
 5. Commented out the code for bookmarks functionality as it will be developed in the future releases of the application.

title: feat: Post details screen creation.
message:
feat: Post details screen creation.

Created post details screen where user can view users, media and comments regarding that particular post. Added these features:

 1. Added a new webservice that will fetch all of the post details in a single instance.
 2. Added appropriate tables that will handle data regarding post details screen.
 3. User can now view post users, media and comments.
 4. Post details (users, media and comments) will be saved in offline db, in a scenario where user doesn't have internet connection, he/she can view the cached data (if it exists).
 5. Post details screen will automatically play gif animation in media section.
 6. Added a settings screen through which user can manage app preferences.

Also, multiple bugs were fixed in this commit regarding database as it was not working as intended previously.

title: feat: Modified posts listing screen.
message:
feat: Modified posts listing screen.

Changed the getPosts webservice and from now on it will take date parameter instead of daysAgo. Added proper technique to display dates before posts listing. Added a network broadcast receiver that will send events containing network info to the PostsFragment. Managed some offline scenarios in the PostsFragment for better UX.

title: feat: Modified posts listing screen.
message:
feat: Modified posts listing screen.

Modified recycler adapter powering the posts listing screen to look much more appealing to the user and added scroll down to load more functionality, i.e., when an user reaches bottom of the list, more items will be fetched from via the webservice. Added proper animations in post listing recycler view for better UX. Also, added the autoincrement unique primary key id field to the "posts_table" so that the ordering of the items can be done sequentially. Also created a custom loading view which will be shown while the data is being loaded for the first time. Integrated swipe refresh layout to update the current available dataset in posts listing screen.

title: feat: Implementation of Posts listing screen.
message:
feat: Implementation of Posts listing screen.

Showing posts to the user in a listing format which is simplistic and easier to read and comprehend.

title: feat: Implemented onboard screen with user authentication.
message:
feat: Implemented onboard screen with user authentication.

Completed oauth flow.

title: feat: Working on implementing an onboarding screen for user.
message:
feat: Working on implementing an onboarding screen for user.

Working on an onboarding screen which user will see for the first time one he/she starts the app for first time. This screen contains some basic introduction of the application, so that any user can get a basic gist of what this app is about.

title: feat: Created basic content provider and SQLite db for persisting data.
message:
feat: Created basic content provider and SQLite db for persisting data.

From now on content provider will manage the data stored in the SQLite database. Created posts table, which will contain data regarding all the posts. Also created tests for checking if crud operations can be applied on the content provider successfully or not.

title: feat: Created account manager for managing auth tokens. Also created some UI…
message:
feat: Created account manager for managing auth tokens. Also created some UI elements of home screen for the app.

Created account manager which will manage authentication token for client type, user can also make new accounts directly from dervice settings. Also, worked on home screen, added navigation drawer and set up the PostsFragment.

title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crazyhitty/Capstone-Project
message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crazyhitty/Capstone-Project

title: feat: Initialized product hunt wrapper.
message:
feat: Initialized product hunt wrapper.

Created core classes required for managing apis using retrofit. User can do perform these things via the wrapper for the time being:
1. Get posts
2. Get post comments
3. Get collections
4. Get my profile
5. Get user profile
6. Get client only auth token

Also, started the work on account authenticator for managing the application's account and its auth token.

title: docs: Added specification document
message:
docs: Added specification document

Added document which consists all the details and flow of this application.

title: Initial commit
message: Initial commit
